description.brief: Implementation of mux/demux logic for base::samples::Joints and base::commands::Joints

package.description: Generic implementation of a N-to-M mapping for base::samples::Joints. It allows to define arbitrary dispatches of joints, either by name or by index, and manage the input->output process.
package.author: Sylvain Joyeux/sylvain.joyeux@dfki.de
